profile:
Serving Edmonton and all surrounding areas. 
We are the capital regions finest wood floor refinishers. 26 yrs experience in this trade and tons of techincal training.
We can wirebrush distress handscrape ceruse or whatever look you want. We can even take existing strip floors and give them the ‘wideplank’ appearance. Our goal is not only to achieve the very best results but to also exceed your expectations. We have won several awards in this field and are internationally recognized. State of the art equipment employed. Wide plank experts. We focus mainly on site finished flooring. Did you now refinishing is approx half the cost of replacing? Not to mention we love to keep perfectly good floors out of the landfill. Call today to see how we can transform your floors into something extraordinary! 7807077542 lwpsalesinfo@gmail.com
@luxurywideplank on instagram
name: Luxury Wide Plank Floors Ltd.
